lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Alison Sudol
[00:01.000] 作词 : Alison Sudol
[00:14.539]Your finger tips across my skin,
[00:19.577]The palm trees swaying in the wind, in my chase.
[00:31.576]You sang me Spanish lullabies
[00:35.377]The sweetest sadness in your eyes
[00:39.377]Clever trick
[00:47.677]Well, I never want to see you unhappy
[00:55.696]I thought you want the same for me
[01:05.798]Goodbye, my almost lover
[01:09.286]Goodbye, my hopeless dream
[01:11.576]I'm trying not to think about you
[01:17.787]Can't you just let me be?
[01:21.787]So long, my luckless romance
[01:24.598]My back is turned on you
[01:30.088]Should've known you'd bring me heartache
[01:33.688]Almost lovers always do
[01:43.395]We walked along a crowded street
[01:48.898]You took my hand and danced with me
[01:53.489]In the shade
[02:00.777]And when you left, you kissed my lips
[02:06.889]You told me you would never, never forget
[02:10.357]These images
[02:14.673]No
[02:17.334]Well, I never want to see you unhappy
[02:24.712]I thought you want the same for me
[02:34.251]Goodbye, my almost lover
[02:38.844]Goodbye, my hopeless dream
[02:43.211]I'm trying not to think about you
[02:46.972]Can't you just let me be?
[02:50.880]So long, my luckless romance
[02:54.880]My back is turned on you
[02:59.374]Should've known you bring me heartache
[03:05.668]Almost lovers always do
[03:12.878]I cannot go to the ocean
[03:16.257]I cannot drive the streets at night
[03:19.957]I cannot wake up in the morning
[03:23.921]Without you on my mind
[03:28.373]So you're gone and I'm haunted
[03:33.498]And I bet you are just fine
[03:36.488]Did I make it that
[03:38.733]Easy to walk right in and out
[03:43.834]Of my life?
[03:50.292]Goodbye, my almost lover
[03:54.683]Goodbye, my hopeless dream
[03:58.068]I'm trying not to think about you
[04:03.178]Can't you just let me be?
[04:05.412]So long, my luckless romance
[04:10.983]My back is turned on you
[04:13.992]Should have known you bring me heartache
[04:18.373]Almost lovers always do
tlyric:
[00:14.539]你的指尖轻滑过我的肌肤
[00:19.577]棕榈树在风中翩翩起舞
[00:31.576]你为我吟唱那西班牙摇篮曲
[00:35.377]你的眼中映出甜蜜的忧伤
[00:39.377]和那狡黠的恶作剧
[00:47.677]我不愿看到你的哀伤
[00:55.696]我以为你也一样
[01:05.798]再见了，我无缘的爱人
[01:09.286]再见了，我无望的梦想
[01:11.576]我试着不再想你
[01:17.787]请让我独自离去
[01:21.787]再见了我不幸的爱
[01:24.598]我将转身离去
[01:30.088]早该知道你只能带给我无尽的心伤
[01:33.688]无缘的爱人总是如此
[01:43.395]我们穿行在拥挤的街道
[01:48.898]你拉住我的手在树荫下与你共舞
[01:53.489]在那阴影里
[02:00.777]当你离开时，你吻着我的唇
[02:06.889]说着你永不忘记
[02:10.357]这一幕
[02:14.673]不
[02:17.334]我永远不愿看见你不快乐的样子
[02:24.712]我以为你也一样
[02:34.251]再见了，我无缘的爱人
[02:38.844]再见了，我无望的梦想
[02:43.211]我试着不再想你
[02:46.972]请让我独自离去
[02:50.880]再见了我不幸的爱
[02:54.880]我将转身离去
[02:59.374]早该知道你只能带给我无尽的心伤
[03:05.668]无缘的爱人总是如此
[03:12.878]我再也无法回到昔日的海边
[03:16.257]我再也无法行驶在午夜的街道
[03:19.957]我再也无法在清晨醒来
[03:23.921]若你在我心中从此消失
[03:28.373]但你离去我却还留在原地
[03:33.498]希望你一切都好
[03:36.488]而我是否能
[03:38.733]轻易的让你走入我的生命
[03:43.834]再离开
[03:50.292]再见了，我无缘的爱人
[03:54.683]再见了，我无望的梦想
[03:58.068]我试着不再想你
[04:03.178]请让我独自离去
[04:05.412]再见了我不幸的爱
[04:10.983]我将转身离去
[04:13.992]早该知道你只能带给我无尽的心伤
[04:18.373]无缘的爱人总是如此
